mapper.select: SELECT l.local_auth_id, l.user_id, l.user_name, l.password, l.create_time, l.last_edit_time, p.user_id, p.name, p.birthday, p.gender, p.phone, p.email, p.profile_img, p.customer_flag, p.shop_owner_flag, p.admin_flag, p.create_time, p.last_edit_time, p.enable_status FROM tb_local_auth l LEFT JOIN tb_person_info p ON l.user_id = p.user_id WHERE l.user_name = #{userName} AND l.password = #{password}

SELECT l.local_auth_id, l.user_id, l.user_name, l.password, l.create_time, l.last_edit_time, p.user_id, p.name, p.birthday, p.gender, p.phone, p.email, p.profile_img, p.customer_flag, p.shop_owner_flag, p.admin_flag, p.create_time, p.last_edit_time, p.enable_status FROM tb_local_auth l LEFT JOIN tb_person_info p ON l.user_id = p.user_id WHERE l.user_id = #{userId}
